Title: Relates to denials of increased utility rates and charges
Summary: Provides that whenever the public service commission denies a request by a utility for an increased rate or charge the rate or charge, or tariff or service immediately in effect prior to the commission's denial shall remain in full force and effect until such time as the commission approves a new rate, charge or service.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to denials of increased utility rates and charges
